ability.Wailing Echo: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Attack when Huashe is hit by a Special move.
ability.Flood Herald: When Rain Dance is active, it increases its Speed by 1 stage and reduces the opponent's Accuracy by 1 stage at each end of the turn.

Phantom Cry.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

Flood Surge.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Spectral Glide.effect: Make the user immune to all Ghost-type moves for the next three turns.

Serpent Strike.effect: Has a 20% chance to cause the target to flinch
